main_text:
Diagrams and Cognition, Applications
5. Diagrams and Cognition, Applications

Despite the formal limitations of some diagrammatic systems noted
above, many different systems are currently used in a wide variety of
contexts; logic teaching, automated reasoning, specifying computer
programs, reasoning about situations in physics, graphical user
interfaces to computer programs, and so on. In general, it is not yet
known how effective (in the above sense) many of these diagrammatic
systems are. We now give a brief survey of other diagrammatic systems
and their uses, as well as the more philosophical issues raised by the
debate over the status of diagrammatic reasoning.
